bug.short_desc: The pressed state is not always removed correctly from a button

long_desc.thetext:
When pressing a button with the left mouse button but releasing the mouse button outside of the button control the "pressed" state is not correctly removed (in fact the _onMouseOver event puts it back). This looks strange in the UI.
The effect can be seen in "http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/demobrowser/index.html#showcase~Dialog.html". Put the left mouse button down on the "Cancel" button, hold the mouse down (like dragging) and release the mouse outside of the button. The style remains pressed. Also, you need to click a focusable widget before the state is correctly reset otherwise it remains pressed.
Just tried to reproduce the issue but could not. Seems like we fixe that on the way.
